Text: Good stuff; but lest anyone actually read this: the torrent contains only Ukranian I and not parts II-III
Hey odoinn....where is II and III??
Unit II and III do not exist (yet?).

I hope this helps people learning Ukrainian! I am ethnic Ukrainian from Belarus who live in America, Russian and Belarusian are my first languages, then English, and then I learned Ukrainian. I used different software though. I think Pimsleur goes quite slowly, I like that.
